app_description: Daily Translate is a practical and versatile translation tool. We have text translation voice translation and camera translation functions for multiple languages. Based on the powerful design we can translate various languages more accurately and closer to life so that you can understand them well. When will Daily Translate be used Of course it s when you come into contact with a new language whether it s when you re traveling to a new place or you re trying to start learning a new language Daily Translate will be your right hand man so you don t have to worry about Worry about not being able to understand a new language. About Daily Translate Text translation Enter text to translate. Enter the content you want to translate and Daily Translate will quickly translate the text into the content you need so that you will no longer feel embarrassed and uneasy because you can t understand it. Text translation is quite effective for learning a new language you can Direct comparison to understand the meaning of each word. Voice translation Voice input translates text. You can speak directly into the microphone and Daily Translate will directly recognize what you are saying and translate it into the language you want which is especially effective when traveling or talking to others to avoid embarrassment. Camera translation Take a photo or translate it. You can directly take a picture of the picture that needs to be translated or you can select a specific picture for translation. This is a very convenient function. You no longer need to manually enter text. You only need to tap the photo button to get the result directly. For the results obtained from translation Daily Translate can directly play copy save or display in full screen covering a variety of practical scenarios. In order to use voice translation and camera translation properly you will need to allow access to the following: Camera Photos Microphone At the same time we are a reliable VPN that improves your online privacy.
